package.description:
This sample ROS node is a Webots robot controller. It subscribes to the 'joy' topic to read the input from a joystick. This input is used to drive a simulated robot in Webots.
It is a good starting point to implement an interface between ROS and Webots, for controlling a simulated robot.
package.author: Andreas Breitenmoser, Olivier Michel, David Butterworth
